statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (14,-9) and (15,11).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{11}-{\left(-{9}\right)}}}{{{15}-{\left({14}\right)}}}=\frac{{20}}{{1}} which reduces to \displaystyle{20} (if it's not already reduced)
